### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE training_materials (
	material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	material_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	material_description TEXT,
	uploaded_by VARCHAR(50),
	upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE employee_profiles (
	emp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	emp_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	emp_email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
	emp_department VARCHAR(50),
	emp_position VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	material_id INT,
	emp_id INT,
	access_time TIMESTAMP,
	FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES training_materials(material_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (emp_id) REFERENCES employee_profiles(emp_id)
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
	feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	material_id INT,
	emp_id INT,
	feedback_content TEXT,
	feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
	FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES training_materials(material_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (emp_id) REFERENCES employee_profiles(emp_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE training_materials SET material_name = 'New Material Name' WHERE material_id = 1;
